official_title: To amend the Social Security Act to further extend health care coverage under the Medicare Program.

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to: (1) entitle qualified World War II Filipino veterans who are either U.S. citizens or permanent residents to benefits under part A (Hospital Insurance) of SSA title XVIII (Medicare); and (2) make them eligible to enroll under Medicare part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance), subject to its deductible, premium, and coinsurance provisions.

titles.title: To amend the Social Security Act to further extend health care coverage under the Medicare Program.
